1:
Conceals you from enemy view
temporarily. The effect expires
if you perform an attack or take
damage.
5:
Nullifies damage from powerful
attacks by automatically evading.
9:
Places a smoker that gradually
restores your health.
13:
Eliminates damage reactions,
prevents wind effects, protects
your hearing, and grants tremor
resistance. You also receive
less damage from attacks.
17:
Prompts monsters to target you
more often and makes them
easier to lure. The effect
expires if you are attacked.
21:
Negates a fixed amount of
damage, after which the
effect expires.
25:
Reduces fire damage, nullifies
fireblight and blastblight,
and prevents damage from
hot environments.
29:
Reduces water damage, nullifies
waterblight, reduces mobility
restrictions in muck and negates
them entirely for deep water.
33:
Reduces ice damage and nullifies
iceblight.
37:
Reduces thunder damage and
nullifies thunderblight and
paralysis.
41:
Reduces dragon damage, nullifies
dragonblight, and powers up your
weapon's dragon properties.
45:
Places a smoker that removes
any abnormal status effects and
elemental blights.
49:
Increases jump airtime and
grants the power to ride
strong winds. Also makes it
easier to mount monsters.
53:
Increases the invulnerability
window while evading and
grants a temporary attack
boost for evading a monster
attack at the very last moment.
57:
Adds a stun effect to most
attacks or increases the
potency of an existing stun
effect.
61:
Increases the probability of
triggering status buildup
when attacking with weapons
that induce abnormal statuses.
65:
Removes and nullifies all
abnormal status effects
for the duration of the effect.
69:
Places a smoker that increases
affinity.
73:
Causes monsters to drop rare
trade-in items when you attack
them.
77:
Increases movement speed and allows
you to hide quicker. Deals big
damage to a monster caught
unaware, then the effect ends.
